item.title: Tools I use for focussed work
item.description: Focus Before Covid-19 happened, I had been reading a lot around the topics of focus, attention and concentration. With so many working from home and adjusting to a home office in a house full of people, I thought it timely to post a list of stuff I’ve been using over the past years. Currently, I depend on the following to stay productive. Wall of Noise In an open office environment, or working from a home with family in it, I need to put something between myself and potential distractions.
